en_us.Ctrl+Shift+N: Open a new window in Incognito mode
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+T: Re-open previously closed tabs in the order they were closed in, up until Chrome first initialized
en_us.Ctrl+Tab: Jump to the next open tab in the current window
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+Tab: Jump to the previous open tab in the current window
en_us.Ctrl+[1-9]: Jump to a specific tab in the current window (9 is always the last tab, no matter how many tabs you have open)
en_us.Alt+Left/Right Arrow: Open the previous/next page in the current tab's browsing history (Back/Forward buttons)
en_us.Ctrl+H: Open the History page in a new tab
en_us.Ctrl+J: Open the Downloads page in a new tab
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+O: Open the Bookmarks Manager in a new tab
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+Delete: Open the Clear Browsing Data options
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+M: Sign in as a different profile or browse as a guest
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+Enter: Add www. and .com to a site name, and open it in a new window (same as above but add Shift)
en_us.Ctrl+K: Jump to the Omnibox from anywhere on the page and search with your default search engine
en_us.Shift+Delete: Remove predictions from your address bar (highlight the suggestion when it appears, and then press the shortcut)
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+R: Reload the current page without using cached content
en_us.Ctrl+S: Save the current page to your computer
en_us.Ctrl+Plus/Minus [+/-]: Zoom in/out on the current page
en_us.Ctrl+0 [zero]: Return the current webpage to the default size
en_us.Ctrl+D: Save the current page as a bookmark
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+D: Save all the open tabs in the current window as bookmarks
en_us.Ctrl+F: Open the Find bar to search in the current page
en_us.Ctrl+G: Go to the next match in your search
en_us.Ctrl+Shift+G: Go to the previous match in your search
en_us.Alt+Home: Open your home page in the current tab
